answers.answer: that is really bad. remember symptoms are not reliable but can really make you feel like ****. get tested bro....im too scared to get tested just yet.

Hi mate..keep the faith...even i found something new yesterday..the top part of my left foot is swollen...my right hand is swollen (the place where my arm joins my hand)..what can i do...i went out today..got a friend who came on holidays from london...drank some beers..life continues man...even i am ******* scared to get my test done next week..i should do it on tuesday...but again only the test is reliable..somtimes i feel like crying..but its no use..first of all i dont kno for sure if i have hiv..secondly hiv is not the end of the world...it is considered like someone who has diabetes...quality an ddurtion of life..we will come of this mate...keep the faith..

I just took two pills, and i'm feeling better now. Monday is the big day... let's hope for the best and keep on praying. I was with a girl lat night and men, all we did was mutual oral sex, I just couldnt go on further I felt so bad and so guilty that I had to leave and go home... I was suppose to go out with another girl today and I just called and cancel....it looks like this will be a long weekend....yeah, I'll keep the faith mate... best of lucks to you and God bless you both....
We will be fine mate..best fo luck to u too..ur in my prayers...hope by this time next week..we will be out from this nightmare..and get back to our normal life...we will get our second chance...
YA WE WILL...KEEP THE FAITH ALWAYS.....

Hola amigo! I still think you will come out of this with a NEG result. It just seems unlikely to me that you would become infected from your exposure.As for me, yes, I tested NEG at 12 wks via OraQuick rapid test. Yesterday, 90 days after exposure, I went to my local health clinic for an STD check-up which also includes a standard ELISA HIV test. I will know my results in 2 wks, or maybe less if the results are ready.Hang in there!
as DR. Bob would always tell me Relax! your Woo hoo! is on its way!  just believe and ahave faith.Joe:)

Oh... man... is difficult to relax... I was reading about the transmission of HIV through a bite, and despite being unlikely it is possible... I just read this:http://www.redcross.org/services/hss/tips/childbitten.htmlMy layers of skin were broken, two layers....and I did bleed...man.. I just can take this anymore... the aching on my knees.. on my muscles....., pharyngitis, the fever.... this is a complete nightmare........and I just cant wake up from it!!!....... I JUST WANT A SECOND CHANCE...

question: Hello Mate..How you doing? Me, not so good. Now, at four weeks, I've been strike by headaches, pharyngitis, dry cough, a little bit of fever, pain in my muscles, and brown spots.. it seems to be that I'm losing more pounds again..... this is a nightmare..Hey.. how you doind Miami.. I read you had a negative result at 12/13 weeks... good luck man.. is good to have a 2nd chance...good luck to you all!!!
title: To Daveansh/MiamiLat
